Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.channels

Class ChannelConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.channels.ChannelConversion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultChannelConversion
    public abstract class ChannelConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    Can convert a given Channel to another Channel.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public Channel convert​(Channel sourceChannel,
                       Configuration configuration)
        Converts the given sourceChannel into a new Channel according to targetChannelDescriptor.
        Parameters:
        sourceChannel - the Channel to be converted
        configuration - can provide additional information for setting up Channels etc.
        Returns:
        the newly created Channel

      • convert

        public abstract Channel convert​(Channel sourceChannel,
                                Configuration configuration,
                                java.util.Collection<OptimizationContext> optimizationContexts,
                                CardinalityEstimate cardinality)
        Converts the given sourceChannel into a new Channel according to targetChannelDescriptor.
        Parameters:
        sourceChannel - the Channel to be converted
        configuration - can provide additional information for setting up Channels etc.
        optimizationContexts - to which estimates of the newly added Operator should be added
        cardinality - optional CardinalityEstimate of the Channel
        Returns:
        the newly created Channel

      • update

        public abstract void update​(Channel sourceChannel,
                            Channel targetChannel,
                            java.util.Collection<OptimizationContext> optimizationContexts,
                            CardinalityEstimate cardinality)
        Update an already existing ChannelConversion.
        Parameters:
        sourceChannel - the Channel to be converted
        targetChannel - the converted Channel
        optimizationContexts - to which estimates of the newly added Operator should be updated
        cardinality - optional CardinalityEstimate of the Channels

      • estimateConversionCost

        public abstract ProbabilisticDoubleInterval estimateConversionCost​(CardinalityEstimate cardinality,
                                                                   int numExecutions,
                                                                   OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
        Estimate the required cost to carry out the conversion for a given cardinality.
        Parameters:
        cardinality - the CardinalityEstimate of data to be converted
        numExecutions - expected number of executions of this instance
        optimizationContext - provides a Configuration and keeps around generated optimization information
        Returns:
        the cost estimate

      • isFiltered

        public abstract boolean isFiltered​(CardinalityEstimate cardinality,
                                   int numExecutions,
                                   OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
        Determine whether this instance is suitable to handle the given conversion.
        Parameters:
        cardinality - the CardinalityEstimate of data to be converted
        numExecutions - expected number of executions of this instance
        optimizationContext - provides a Configuration and keeps around generated optimization information
        Returns:
        whether this instance should be filtered
